name: Pinto's Pride
flavorText: A group of monks on a mission from the Patriarchs entered a small village in the west. Here they met a smith named Pinto, and were much impressed by his mighty beard. Touched at their admiration, Pinto agreed to create a pair of bracers that would enhance their powers.
flavorTextHtml: A group of monks on a mission from the Patriarchs entered a small village in the west. Here they met a smith named Pinto, and were much impressed by his mighty beard. Touched at their admiration, Pinto agreed to create a pair of bracers that would enhance their powers.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [4.5 - 6.0]%

secondary.textHtml: Wave of Light also Slows enemies by 80% for 3 seconds and deals 135% increased damage. (Monk Only) [125 - 150]%
